command.desc: Returns news update on Runescape Homepage
command.response: -Vectra- ** (RSNEWS): Date: 05-Feb-2008 Title: Audio Week and Improved Edgeville Dungeon -Vectra- ** (RSNEWS): This week, various improvements and tweaks have been made to our instruments and spot effects, alongside the introduction of a brand new music system. To celebrate, we have given you the opportunity to unlock an awesome Air Guitar emote! Which is less than useful when fending off creatures from the improved Edgeville Dungeon... -Vectra- ** (RSNEWS): Read more at: http://news.runescape.com/newsitem.ws?id=1086

command.desc: Put the combat checker on/off - Checks the combat stats when someone joins your channel. No kickban at this point.
command.response: -<Vectra>- ** (CMB CHECKER): The combat checker has been enabled for #vectra. -<Vectra>- ** (CMB CHECKER): The combat checker has been disabled for #vectra.

command.desc: Enables requirment kickbans, if someone join your channel and this is enabled, they get a 1 min timeban. NOTE: The combat checker got to be turned ON for this to work. [Example]: !setreq 100 99 99 189
command.response: -Vectra- ** (SET REQS): The requirements for #vectra has been set to: 100 Combat, 99 Strength, 99 Attack and 189 Att+Str

command.desc: Turns the requirment kickban off, but the combat check is still on.
command.response: -Vectra- ** (SET REQS): All requirement has been deleted

command.desc: Voices all that meets the requirements on join.
command.response: -Vectra- ** (SET REQS): I will now voice everyone that meets the requirements

command.desc: Sets the pm nicks for your channe. Type !pm and the bot will say Message nick in game for voice. [Example]: !setreq Pm For_Sooth
command.response: -Vectra- ** (SET REQS): You have set the pm nick(s) to For_Sooth

command.desc: Shows the urban definition for a word
command.response: -Vectra- ** (URBAN): Defenition for the word "Runescape" is: this game reminds me of people playing snkae on cell phones. once youve played it and you get bored later, its the first thing you think of doing. you know its a waste of time but you cant stop. i advise you to NEVER play this unless you want it to consume your soul... i wish i hadnt gotten into it... -Vectra- ** (URBAN): Example: runescape has a better chance of taking over the world than hitler had...
